code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HomeCarousel=_ref=>{let{slides=[]}=_ref;const[currentSlide,setCurrentSlide]=useState(0);useEffect(()=>{const interval=setInterval(()=>{setCurrentSlide(prev=>(prev+1)%slides.length);},5000);return()=>clearInterval(interval);},[slides.length]);const goToSlide=index=>{setCurrentSlide(index);};if(slides.length===0)return null;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"relative w-full overflow-hidden rounded-lg shadow-xl",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex transition-transform duration-700 ease-in-out",style:{transform:`translateX(-${currentSlide*100}%)`},children:slides.map((slide,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"w-full flex-shrink-0 relative",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:slide.image,alt:slide.text,className:"w-full h-64 md:h-96 object-cover"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"absolute inset-0 bg-black bg-opacity-40 flex items-center justify-center p-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-white text-2xl md:text-4xl font-bold text-center drop-shadow-lg",children:slide.text})})]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"absolute bottom-4 left-0 right-0 flex justify-center space-x-2",children:slides.map((_,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>goToSlide(index),className:`w-3 h-3 rounded-full transition-all duration-300 ${currentSlide===index?'bg-white scale-125':'bg-gray-400'}`,"aria-label":`Go to slide ${index+1}`},index))})]});};export default HomeCarousel;
